name: 10 Seconds Disasters
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 51



Build yourself a path to victory, but be careful, every 10 seconds, the nature is against you.

[How to Play]

Controls: WASD - move 

Space - Jump

E - Grab/Place

Q - Drop

ESC - Menu

[Content]

6 different events can happend to you:

  • harmless sunshine
  • strong wind which will push you away
  • meteor which leave not-movable stone
  • blizzard which will slow you down
  • earthquake - destroy a common platform
  • fog - makes you harder to see

4 Block Types:

  • Common platform
  • Trampoline
  • Rail
  • Moving platform
